summary: Makes ohdaviing a white dragon with red marking and gold eyes.
descriptionHtml:
Again just something small because I wasn\'t so thrilled about this guys colors. 
unpack and drop in your Data folder ( C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data ) 


to uninstall ,you can find it in  Data\\textures\\actors\\dragon

the files are
dragon_ohdaviing_lod.dds
ohdaviing.dds
translucentwings_ohdaviing.dds

~~Spacerogue~

note; _lod and translucentwings have not been changed, however they appear to be needed as otherwise your dragon will have black patches instead of holes in his wings. And perhaps other things that appear that I have not noticed jet.
author: aikospacerogue Spacerogue
